original_text:
If I have sinned, what have I done to you,
    you who see everything we do?
Why have you made me your target?
    Have I become a burden to you?
korean_text: 사람을 감찰하시는 이여 내가 범죄하였던들 주께 무슨 해가 되오리이까 어찌하여 나를 당신의 과녁으로 삼으셔서 내게 무거운 짐이 되게 하셨나이까

sentences.original_text: what have I done to you
you who see everything we do
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 하는 모든 것을 보시는 당신

sentences.original_text: Why have you made me your target
Have I become a burden to you
